node.title: The Parables of Jesus: A Matter of Generosity, Not Just Desserts
node.description: What do we get for following God? That was the questions asked by Peter, one of Jesus disciples. Interestingly, Jesus answered him, and He answers all those who have and still ask the same question. In this message on the parable of the eleventh hour workers, Pastor Chris Buttery shows the incredible generosity of our Heavenly Father.
